document.full_text: pau gasol scored a team-high 25 points and andrew bynum added 14 rebounds before being ejected to help the nba champion los angeles lakers beat the minnesota timberwolves 106-98 friday.
document.title: gasol fuels lakers to win over struggling wolves
lines_and_colors: pau gasol scored a team-high 25 points and andrew bynum added 14 rebounds before being ejected to help the nba champion los angeles lakers beat the minnesota timberwolves 106-98 friday.
